amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds by ICE to process the release of, or to administer alternative forms of detention to, illegal immigrants who committed a crime which mandated their incarceration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds used in contravention of section 236(c) of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 289 - 131 (Roll no. 398).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 289 - 131 (Roll no. 398).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Cravaack.
